DESCRIPTION: Gems can be placed into this Socket at a Rest Site to combine the Gem's effect with this card's effect.

A card in #yStasis gains a turn counter equal to its cost plus #b1. NL Turn counter is reduced by #b1 at the start of your turn. NL When the counter reaches #b0, it is returned to your hand and costs #b0 until played.
#yGems can be placed into #ySockets in cards at a Rest Site. Cannot be #yUpgraded.
While in #yDefensive #yMode, you have #b3 #yThorns and gain #b2 #yBlock when you play a card.
Reduce the turn counter of a card in #yStasis by #b1. If the card's turn counter is now #b0, return it to your hand. It costs #b0 until played.
0-cost #yExhausting #ySkill that generates three cards inspired by a chosen Construct of the Spire, and reduces their cost by #b1 for this combat.
A #yMomentary buff effect also adds a debuff effect which causes you to lose the buff's effect at the end of your turn.
When this card leaves #yStasis, #yExhaust it instead of returning it to your hand.
This effect is triggered whenever this card's turn counter is reduced while in #yStasis.
